Nidha (for instance), khula (open) joto nirkhao (dumping) do doho chalau ge menaka, poribesh dusit (environmental pollution) ar hoṛmo hasu (health hazards) re sahay (contributing) kana, besesh do durbal (vulnerable) somaj (communities) ko re asar (impacting) kana.

Bes (adequate) infrastructure (sanrachana) re kami (lack), jaha re bes joto jamay (collection systems) ar joto banaw (processing) bhawan (facilities) samil (included) menaka, somosya do besh barhao (exacerbates) kana. Adi ganang dhao do joto chayan (waste pickers) (kana - rag pickers) ko do hat te joto ko chanu (sort through) darkar kana, jaha do ko haṭa (health) khatra (risks) re ulṭa (exposing) kana.

normalised: Composting ar biogas bana (generation) do, judi besh (promising) samadhan (solutions) ko kana, adi elaqa re marang pora (at scale) re lagu (implemented) bań doho akana. Incineration (joto jaraw), judi kuchh jagah re lagu (used) kana, nidha A I I M S Delhi sara re leka, hawas dusit (air pollution) ko lamba (raises concerns) kana judi bes bana (managed) bań doho akana. Swachh Bharat Abhiyan, dhor October bar hazar cholish (2nd October 2014) re chalau (launched) akana, nowa somosya ko niyama (address) lagit nishan (aims) akada, hate lagatar kuri (sustained efforts) ar somaj samil (community participation) ko bes dhiri (crucial) kana. Bar hazar pantis (2030) bhitar do, joto bana (waste production) do sabh dhao uchaw (all time high) re andaj (estimated) kana. Nowa somosya ko re besh nazar (more focus) doho darkar kana, ona do nagar palika (municipalities) ko do sada kam budget (constrained budgets) sate ge kami (function) kana, kuchh dhao do miṭṭen hoṛ lagit salana pachas ṭaka leka ge joto nipat (waste management) lagit doho (allocating) kana.

normalised: Solid Waste Management Rules, bar hazar sola (2016), ar bahi poribesh niyam (environmental regulations) ko ro lagu (implementation) do rajya ar staniya nikay (local bodies) ko re ek leka (inconsistent) bań doho akana. Nigarani (monitoring) ar lagu (enforcement) ko do palana (compliance) pakka (ensure) lagit bes dhiri (essential) kana. Delhi re Ghazipur landfill ko bhabaw (consider) me, jaha do dhor December bar hazar unnis (31st December 2019) re naw baja sara (around 09:00 hours) ona khali (its capacity) re pahuṛ akana ar doho miṭṭen marang poribesh khatra ko ulṭa (pose) kana. Abon lagit nawa (innovative) technology (prodyogiki) ar alga (decentralized) joto nipat (waste management) model ko nowa baraha (growing) somosya ko bes (effectively) niyama (tackle) lagit darkar (need) menaka. I I T ko ar bahi khoj somstha (research institutions) ko do Bharat paristhiti (Indian context) ko lagit samadhan (solutions) ko banao (creating) re nazar (focus) doho (should put) darkar kana.
